name: KoGaMa Friends
description: KoGaMa is one of the largest sources of the best user-created online games including parkour games, funny games, arcade games, multiplayer games, internet games, shooting games, RPG games, racing games, adventure games and much more. Tons of comments ratings, gamers of all skill levels are sure to find hot new games every day. On KoGaMa you can create and publish your own games.
